post.body: (im not sure how to dm on my fone!) it was great for him to finally meet u! twitterplus real life equals nice :). ur cool.
that would be awesome!!! we're driving back late tomorrow night tho...it might be too late!? will twitter u guys if we stop t
thanks friend! it will be FUUUN! I'm pretty sure Matty loves u more.
I'm so glad he likes his gift! :) hope u guys r having fun in H-town.
we most definitely do. words can't even describe our thankfulness. thanks be to God.
I'm so proud of u!! and so sad for your feet all in one. Hope it feels better soon. Merry Christmas!
look at u twittering! go LJ go! Merry Christmas from Matty & I! much love 2 u brother.
Merry Christmas! can't wait to hang in the New Year. Shalom to u.
yeah I'm at towneast. I love it here. wish u could join us. where will u be?
lovely to meet you tonight! looking forward to getting to hang more soon. your art is beautiful!
great 2 c you tonight Andrew Hudson! MERRY CHRISTMAS to you! (i'm sorry that i didn't take your card. i would love to have 1!)
sorry that our conversation got interrupted, but enjoyed chatting for a bit.
so great to see you again and to meet your lovely wife! @themattlarsen would love to talk w/ you sometime about college stuff.
great to see you tonight!
haha... so so sad!!! i can totally relate to the smell. hope it gets outta there soon!
starbucks pit stop #1 on our way to fotograph a friend's wedding in beaumont.
watched 'It's a Wonderful Life' twice, watched 'A Christmas Carol' & now watching 'Polar Bear Express.' awesome!
:::Merry Christmas::: Peace on earth...
warming up @ TE for 3 Christmas Eve services today. Come join us @ 2pm, 4pm & 6pm. Merry Christmas!!
at music practice for Christmas service! merry Christmas errybody!
